item.title: IMelda BravO MarPaung add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: IMelda BravO MarPaung add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: IMelda BravO MarPaung add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: IMelda BravO MarPaung add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: IMelda BravO MarPaung add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "Love never dies a natural death. It dies because we don't know how to replenish its source. It dies of blindness and errors and betrayals. It dies of illness and wounds; it dies of weariness, of witherings, of tarnishings." -- Anais Nin

item.title: IMelda BravO MarPaung add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Have you ever been in love? Horrible isn't it? It makes you so vulnerable. It opens your chest and it opens up your heart and it means that someone can get inside you and mess you up." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: IMelda BravO MarPaung add a quote by Victor Hugo
item.description: "What Is Love? I have met in the streets a very poor young man who was in love. His hat was old, his coat worn, the water passed through his shoes and the stars through his soul" -- Victor Hugo

item.title: IMelda BravO MarPaung add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "You talk when you cease to be at peace with your thoughts." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: IMelda BravO MarPaung add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on." -- Robert Frost

item.title: IMelda BravO MarPaung add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "Forgive, O Lord, my little jokes on Thee And I'll forgive Thy great big one on me." -- Robert Frost

item.title: IMelda BravO MarPaung add a quote by Pramoedya Ananta Toer
item.description: "Orang boleh pandai setinggi langit, tapi selama ia tidak menulis, ia akan hilang di dalam masyarakat dan dari sejarah. Menulis adalah bekerja untuk keabadian." -- Pramoedya Ananta Toer

item.title: IMelda BravO MarPaung add a quote by Fahd Djibran
item.description: "seperti udara, aku mencintaimu, selalu terikat ruang. seperti cuaca, aku menyayangimu selalu terikat waktu. seperti hujan, aku membencimu, sewaktu-waktu." -- Fahd Djibran

item.title: IMelda BravO MarPaung add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: IMelda BravO MarPaung add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: IMelda BravO MarPaung add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: IMelda BravO MarPaung add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "Do one thing every day that scares you." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: IMelda BravO MarPaung add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: IMelda BravO MarPaung add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: IMelda BravO MarPaung add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West
